rows.label: qev018301_MSG0001
rows.name: Miranium, miranium, miranium![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Sure, creating battle probes requires a special breed of
genius, but mostly it takes a ton of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0003
rows.name:
So please supply me with the material I need to build
the first in a series of ranged attack probes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0004
rows.name: Don't let this little wonder die on the page.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev018301_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Hugo that you'd be honored to help.

rows.label: qev018301_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev018301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Hugo what, exactly, he needs all this miranium for.

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh, thank you. It's a blessing to have found such a
cooperative and understanding patron such as yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0006
rows.name:
Unfortunately, my design requires...er...20,000 units.
Think you can swing it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0007
rows.name:
Miranium is useful for damn near everything.
Depending on how you work it, it can be harder than
steel, or as supple as aluminum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0008
rows.name: It's the most universal design material we have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0009
rows.name: And I need a bunch. Say...20,000 units? Thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Let's make this new kind of battle probe happen, eh?
You and me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Sorry to demand so much. If it makes you feel better,
I at least realize that the quantities I'm asking for are
somewhat insane.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I also promise to deliver a product worthy of the
materials and your efforts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0013
rows.name: In a sane world, I'd have industry support for my work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0014
rows.name:
But the fools cutting grant checks still haven't wised up
as to how amazing my battle probes are![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Without your support, I wouldn't have been able to
realize any of my designs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0016
rows.name:
It's crazy, I know, but sadly true.
Genius is so rarely appreciated in its own time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0017
rows.name:
Anyway, my point is that you've been a massive help.
Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0018
rows.name:
These designs of mine hold new hope for BLADE,
as well as all of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0019
rows.name:
And yet a meager thing like a lack of materials keeps
them from seeing the light of day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0020
rows.name:
It's all so absurd. Don't even get me started.
So, um...do you have the miranium yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_JNK0030
rows.name: Deliver

rows.label: qev018301_SEL0031
rows.name: Hand over 20,000 units of miranium.

rows.label: qev018301_JNK0040
rows.name: Keep

rows.label: qev018301_SEL0041
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Excellent! That should be enough to start production on
the first in my series of ranged attack probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Don't move an inch. I'll have it from blueprint to built
before you can blink.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0023
rows.name: ...Boom! Done! Cue the pyrotechnics![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0024
rows.name: Presenting the ranged attack probe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Pop this bad boy into a FrontierNav probe site,
and it'll amp your ranged attack power as long as
you're within the region the probe is placed in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Even the fanciest Skell can't offer this sort of dramatic
change in battle conditions, am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0027
rows.name:
Use it to turn anything that wants to harm New LA
and its people into Swiss cheese![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0029
rows.name: Actually, hmm... You're acquainted with Kirsty, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0030
rows.name: Tell me...what is she like?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_JNK0050
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev018301_SEL0051
rows.name: Wax poetic about Kirsty's many admirable qualities.

rows.label: qev018301_JNK0060
rows.name: Criticize

rows.label: qev018301_SEL0061
rows.name: Bemoan how difficult Kirsty is to work with.

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0031
rows.name:
I see. Well, if she's as sharp as you say, she should be
able to grasp the genius of my battle probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0032
rows.name:
Thank you. I'll be sure to pay her a visit sometime in
the near future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0033
rows.name:
That big a pain, is she? Hmm... But I'm afraid the
reality of the situation dictates that I deal with her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0034
rows.name:
It will be a challenge, but I shall do my best to impress
her when we next meet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0035
rows.name: ...Hmm? Why am I meeting with her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0036
rows.name:
Well, up till now, I've been able to continue my work
using the miranium you've brought me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0037
rows.name:
But if I hope to ramp up to large-scale development—
which I do—I'll need industry and BLADE support.
There's just no way around it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0038
rows.name:
She's a FrontierNav pro, and well-connected with all the
industry heads. Her backing would be huge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0039
rows.name: I can't predict if she'll go for this, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0040
rows.name:
I suppose I'll have to hope that she knows true potential
when she sees it. Anyway, we'll just have to see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0041
rows.name:
What, am I supposed to bow down first?
Build you a little shrine?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018301_MSG0042
rows.name: I'm dying to get started here. Have mercy![ST:wait ]
